body.name: O-Cedar ProMist MAX Washable Refill, 4 Count (Pack of 1), Red and White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 58 mins
features: GENUINE O-CEDAR REFILL: Get the most from your O-Cedar ProMist MAX Microfiber Spray Mop with genuine O-Cedar refills that are designed to work together and provide optimal performance

REMOVES OVER 99% OF BACTERIA: Genuine O-Cedar mop heads remove over 99% of bacteria using only water*. They don't need bleach or detergent. * BMA Labor GbR Labs tested O-Cedar ProMist MAX refills on May 16, 2022. The tests confirmed the effectiveness of the refills. This claim remains accurate and true today.
WASHABLE & REUSABLE MOP REFILLS: The mop head replacement can be machine washed and reused, saving time and money! Keep an extra refill handy for the next mess.

HARDWOOD FLOORS: O-Cedar's ProMist MAX Spray Mop Refill is safe, gentle and effective at cleaning dirty messes on all hard-surfaced floors, including finished hardwood, laminate, ceramic tile, vinyl, linoleum and more.
USE FOR MOPPING OR DUSTING: Our mop head is a versatile cleaning product, as it can be used wet for deep cleaning and mopping or dry for dusting purposes!

TACKLE STUCK-ON MESSES: Made of 100% microfiber, the mop head replacement is soft and gentle to prevent streaking or scratching of hard floor surfaces while the scrubbing zones on the mop pad have the strength to remove tough stuck-on or dried-on messes.
body.description: O-Cedar’s ProMist MAX Microfiber Spray Mop Refill effectively removes dirt and grime with just water! This washable and reusable refill will save cleaning time and money while reducing waste compared to disposable mop pads. Clean your floors with a reusable dual-sided microfiber mop pad that allows you to clean twice the floor area without taking the extra time to change the mop pad. You can machine-wash and re-use your microfiber mop head replacement. This will save you cleaning time and money! It's also more eco-friendly to the environment than using a traditional, cotton mop. Simply, wash in warm water and lay flat to dry. For a better clean, use a different mop refill to clean different rooms in your home. Scrubbing zones on the mop pad tackle those stubborn stuck-on messes. This spray mop is effective and safe for all hard floors, including hardwood. This mop head refill is compatible with the O-Cedar ProMist MAX Microfiber Spray Mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They’re strong and absorbent and fit perfectly onto the O-Cedar mop. They wash and dry well too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Deal for the real Brand Name Refils!
reviews.reviewText: These are the brand name O-Cedar refills! Not a knockoff! I really shopped around, and this was by far the best deal anywhere! If you are shopping for these refull cloth/heads, then you already have this mop, so you already know how great and convenient it is! If you want a few additional refill cloths for it, this is the best deal in town! Great product, and best price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these! They fit in the OCello mops. You can wash them and reuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: Used for ocedar spray mop. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These pads are easy to put on, easy to wash, and collect a lot of dirt. Only thing I didn’t like was that the pattern on the pads leave lines on the floor so I have to go over the same spot a few times or press down really hard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and cleans my laminate floor with minimal amount of cleaner.
reviews.reviewText: Works well and can be thrown in the washer and let air dry not drier dry, Nice to have spares.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to clean my mats
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace my mop and clean my mats in a more hygienic method. It makes it quick and efficient to clean my mats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars O-Cedar Promist max washable refill, 4 count, red and white
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for a gift. They are very absorbent and practical. I ordered an extra pad for convenience. I would definitely order these again from this seller. I suggest soaking them in a whitening liquid detergent to remove any stains.

I bought these because I need to clean up after pets.I like that I can remove them easily without getting my hands mucked up, they're easy to rinse out, and even easier to toss in the wash.They're easy to put on, stay on the mop head firmly when in use, and store away nicely until needed.They're work well for dust-mopping but are also reasonably absorbent for cleaning up spills.
Love the fact these are reusable. Saves the environment by not tossing out paper-based scrubbing pads (such as Swiffer, etc.), and saves money in the long run as well. Highly recommend this.
Perfect fit for my pro mist. Might even be better than the name brand cloths. Wash well and no signs of wear

If there's a one-star review for this product from me, ignore it. I did that in error. So far I'm giving this 5 stars. They arrived in good time, work as promised, are easy to slip on and off the ProMist 'mop' and did fine after having thrown the soiled ones in the washing machine. I think the price was good, too. No complaints here!
I bought these for the Vileda Promist Mop and they work well.
